name: GIBSPLOSION!
description:
Gibsplosion is a PS1-inspired, gore-filled arena shooter that takes inspiration from popular FPS games in the 90's.

Gibsplosion is a blast to the past of the PS1 era of FPS games, taking inspiration from games like Quake, Doom, and Unreal. It features a hard rock soundtrack to get your blood pumping and bullets flying!

Battle through 4 distinct campaign episodes in your quest to stop the darkness haunting reality and save your sanity. Throughout your adventure you will use the typical shotgun, machine gun, and rocket launcher, as well as unconventional weaponry such as a gun that turns your pain into your enemy's pain!

  • 30 Non-Linear levels split over 4 chapters
  • 5 boss fights to challenge your knowledge of the game
  • Alternate Fire Modes to make weapons more dynamic
  • A multitude of cheat codes and power-ups
  • Kill enemies to gain Nightmare Fuel to increase your damage output
  • 4 special abilities to enhance your movement and killing ability
I highly recommend using the itch.io app to install GIBSPLOSION!
